com.uce.userlab.haptics.event
Class HapticListenerSupport

java.lang.Object
  com.uce.userlab.haptics.event.HapticListenerSupport

public class HapticListenerSupport
extends java.lang.Object

This supports Device implimentations with managing listeners and firing events to those Haptics Listeners. It provides methods to fire all the event set out within the HapticListener interface with different inputs that maybe needed to create the HapticEvent object.

See Also:
Device, HapticListener, HapticEvent

          Creates a new HapticListenerSupport object for a give source object

Parameters:

removeHapticListener

public void removeHapticListener(HapticListener listener)
Removes a HapticListener from the notify list for any events fired from then on

Parameters:
listener - The HapticListener to remove

Returns the list of HapticListener objects to notify as an Array of HapticListener objects

getNumOfListeners

Returns the number of HapticListener objects on the notify list

Returns:

Parameters:
message - The message describing the event
eventCode - The identifier for the type of event to be fired
currentPos - The position of the device when the event was fired
input - The input on the device when the event was fired
